A bug introduced when clipboard support was added at the base contributor 
class. Fixed.

Actually, you are right, but not quite. The problem is with dropAction.mxsd - 
the only one that is causing problems. So it has nothing to do with the number 
of schema files opened, just with that one.

OK, fixed. File 'dropActions.mxsd' was corrupted, but PDE was creating the 
status object wrong when firing exception, resulting in Assert error. The real 
exception was I/O, but it allowed the editor to come up. Making the editor 
dirty and saving the file fixed it. I fixed the I/O exception throwing and the 
file is repaired now. All other *.mxsd files appear to be fine.
